info.author: Seth Rees
info.description:
Beacon IRC Bot ============== Beacon is the successor to my previous bot, [sthrs/Pythot](https://github.com/sthrs/Pythot), in turn a fork of [sbp/phenny](https://github.com/sbp/phenny). I plan on porting modules from phenny and Pythot (it's not that difficult, just upgrade it for Python 3 and change around a few variable names). Before you begin, the prerequisites are: * Python 3.1+ * [PyYAML](http://pyyaml.org) After that, edit the `conf.yaml.sample` file, move it to `conf.yaml`, and run: 
$ ./main.py
to start the bot. Have fun! Testing ======= Tests are performed in the `test/` directory. Tests can be run individually on a per-file basis, or they can all be run at once by running `__init__.py`.
info.keywords: irc bot ircbot python3 python modular
info.name: Beacon
